title: Underground
description: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.  Phoenix has spent her whole life fighting. All she's ever wanted was to return the world to a peaceful state, and bring down the New World Order. But now she finds herself in a different sort of battle. No longer set in the streets of New Berlin, the fighting has moved beneath them, in a vicious underground fighting ring run by outlaws bent on causing trouble. And if that isn't hard enough, she's stuck with the one person who loves to fight more than she does - Trent McKay. Now the race is on to get out of their new prison and back home - before they end up killing each other.  Or worse - fall in love.  ***This book is for mature audiences due to strong language, violence, and sexual situations.  New World Series Switch Masked Tested Underground Silence
author: Janelle Stalder
